page.title: 17THORNTONS
page.content: {G.W. Thornton's}make steel not chocolates. They have machines that make paint scrapers, gouging tools for fashioning wood, ball joints for hip replacements, cutting blades for coal machines and blades for turbines which drive jet aircraft. In the factory it is very hot and noisy. You have to wear goggles. We saw a factory cat. It was very dirty and laid asleep on a machine through all the noise. The noise is so loud that you have to shout & then it sounds like a whisper. They have to magnify the products to see if anything is wrong with them. They have to be bang on the right size & shape. If they arent perfect for the aeroplanes it can be very dangerous. There are 145 people employed. They try to employ families because they get on well.
